column5: <think>#Newline<set var="number1"><star index="2"/></set>#Newline<set var="animal1"><srai>SINGULAR <star index="3"/></srai></set>#Newline<set var="legs1"><uniq><subj><get var="animal1"/></subj><pred>legs</pred><obj>?legs1</obj></uniq></set>#Newline<set var="number2"><star index="5"/></set>#Newline<set var="animal2"><srai>SINGULAR <star index="6"/></srai></set>#Newline<set var="legs2"><uniq><subj><get var="animal2"/></subj><pred>legs</pred><obj>?legs2</obj></uniq></set>#Newline<set var="formula"><get var="number1"/>*<get var="legs1"/>+<get var="number2"/>*<get var="legs2"/></set>#Newline</think>#Newline<srai>ROUND <srai>WHAT IS <get var="formula"/></srai></srai> legs.

<think>#Newline<set var="number1"><star index="2"/></set>#Newline<set var="animal1"><srai>SINGULAR <star index="3"/></srai></set>#Newline<set var="legs1"><uniq><subj><get var="animal1"/></subj><pred>legs</pred><obj>?legs1</obj></uniq></set>#Newline<set var="formula"><get var="number1"/>*<get var="legs1"/></set>#Newline</think>#Newline<srai>ROUND <srai>WHAT IS <get var="formula"/></srai></srai> legs.
